answers.text: @muhdiekuh I read your tweet three times and asked myself "why does he do  spontaneous combustion with ExtJS" #froscon #goodMorningEveryone
Now @muhdiekuh giving his spontaneous talk about ExtJS. #froscon #HS6
Listening to @muhdiekuh's talk "Introduction to #ExtJS": The base of most applications is a grid! Kind of reminds me of #tron. #froscon
While #extjs seems to have better widgets I think #dojo is much more powerful and versatile. @muhdiekuh #froscon #javascript
